title: Understanding the Problem
text: To solve this problem, we need to identify what 'X' represents in the context of the problem. Think about what 'X' is describing.

title: Defining 'X'
text: In the problem, 'X' is defined as the number of days a student is absent. What kind of term is used to describe such a quantity?

title: Identifying 'X'
text: X' is a term that can take on different values depending on the student. What is this term called?
